interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Empty Amber Glass Spray Bottles - (4 Pack) 16 oz with Labels Refillable Container for Essential Oils, Cleaning Solutions, Cleaning Products, Hair, Plant Mister, Daily Shower, Gardening or Aromatherapy Review Date: 2021/02/09 Store: AYL Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AYL', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 7.6 x 7.17 inches; 2.98 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'EmptyAmberGlassSprayBottles 4 Pack', 'UPC': '860005177202'} Review Text: I have been slowly switching my cleaning products over to more environmentally friendly and wanted to start investing in glass spray bottles and soap dispensers as well. These are just beautiful, the perfect size and came packaged very well to keep the glass from breaking in transit.

These are just as esthetically pleasing as they are practical and I will be purchasing more in the future. I loved the personal touch of the note inside from the seller as I always love to support small businesses. These spray bottles are great if you are in the market do not hesitate to purchase them. Review Title: Beautiful Amber Glass Spray Bottles! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Gel Nail Polish Set, Holiday Red Black 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Anzuo {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 3.7 x 3.3 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FZ', 'UPC': '738626208554'} I should have read the description on this set better, before ordering as they do not come with a base or top coat which is necessary to get the best longevity out of gel polish.

However I did order the base and top coat from this same brand on Amazon and it works really well. I love the colors in this set and it seems to last about 12-14 days as long as you prep your nails like you should for gel polish.

The color swatch stickers are also nice so you can paint them cure them and apply them to the tops of the bottles and you know which color is which without opening each bottle! Good quality gel polish, but wish it included the base and top coat! Soo'AE Sweet Pink Bubble Mask, Clarifying & Softening, 1 Count SOOAE {'Brand': 'SOOAE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Softer', 'Scent': 'Peach', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 0.1 x 5.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} I got this as a stocking stuffer for my daughter, I will update the review once she uses it if we see any irritation or issues with it. She loves these mask so I'm always trying to find some different ones we haven't tried before. Great stocking stuffer! Womens’ Metallic Finish Non Slip Grip 48 Counts 2 Inches Hair Bobby Pins Gray DARONGFENG {'Brand': 'DARONGFENG', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Gray', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal, Rubber', 'Package Dimensions': '4.61 x 2.52 x 0.35 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '788465401296'} Good quality bobby pins that hold really well. I haven't seen the gray color in stores so it was really nice that you could order this color on Amazon. Great bobby pins, Love that you can get them in the gray color! Facial Cleansing Brush made with Ultra Hygienic Soft Silicone 4-PACK HAMUULL {'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 1.97 x 0.08 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '779683799654', 'Manufacturer': 'HAMUULL'} I love these silicone face scrubbers, they exfoliate the skin so well and are easy to clean. Just place a dab of your favorite facial cleanser on the scrubber and go to work. It helps with creating a rich lather and exfoliating all of the skin. Great for exfoliating the skin! Gel Nail Polish Set, Glitter 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Anzuo {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.15 x 3.54 inches; 10.23 Ounces'} These gel polish shimmer colors are beautiful and perfect on their own with two coats or over top of a base color coat. They cure easily with a UV light and are chip resistant for almost 2 weeks.

Very durable polish and great selection of colors in this set! Great gel polish, perfect shimmer colors to go over a base color coat! Empty Amber Glass Spray Bottles - (4 Pack) 16 oz with Labels Refillable Container for Essential Oils, Cleaning Solutions, Cleaning Products, Hair, Plant Mister, Daily Shower, Gardening or Aromatherapy AYL {'Brand': 'AYL', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 7.6 x 7.17 inches; 2.98 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'EmptyAmberGlassSprayBottles 4 Pack', 'UPC': '860005177202'} I have been slowly switching my cleaning products over to more environmentally friendly and wanted to start investing in glass spray bottles and soap dispensers as well. These are just beautiful, the perfect size and came packaged very well to keep the glass from breaking in transit.

These are just as esthetically pleasing as they are practical and I will be purchasing more in the future. I loved the personal touch of the note inside from the seller as I always love to support small businesses. These spray bottles are great if you are in the market do not hesitate to purchase them. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** The user continues to favor gel nail products and skincare tools, particularly those that focus on cleansing and exfoliation. Interest in vibrant hair accessories remains, with a strong inclination towards unique designs and eco-friendly options.

- **Quality Focus:** Highly values high-quality, durable, non-toxic, and cruelty-free beauty products. Also seeks functional and aesthetically pleasing items, particularly with a modern and environmentally friendly edge.

- **Purchase Behavior:** Engages in thoughtful product sourcing, emphasizing items that enhance personal routines, aid in informed gift-giving, and reflect a growing focus on sustainable practices. The user recently invested in refillable glass containers for cleaning solutions, indicating a shift towards environmentally conscious choices.

- **Color Aesthetic:** Enjoys a vibrant color palette in beauty products and hair accessories, with recent purchases showcasing a preference for shimmery shades.

- **DIY Enthusiasm:** Maintains enthusiasm for at-home beauty routines across nail care and skincare, highlighting a hands-on approach that extends into home organization through thoughtful purchases.

- **Packaging Preference:** Appreciates effective and practical packaging, especially for eco-friendly products that minimize environmental impact.

- **Review Engagement:** Actively leaves detailed feedback based on product experiences, demonstrating a desire to share insights and support small businesses in the beauty and home goods sectors.

Overall, the user blends quality, sustainability, and practicality while embracing a colorful aesthetic in their beauty, skincare, and organization pursuits.
